labels.label:
Since, to prepare the POST body, we need to replace the flowfile's contents, it is necessary to duplicate the flowfile to preserve its data.
However, before deciding what to do with the data, we need to know if it is valid.
This processor sets some attributes which will be needed later, to both preserve the data and wait for validation results.
This processor is what allows waiting for the validation's results before deciding what to do with the data.
Now that the 'valid' field's value has been extracted, the contents of the flowfile may be emptied, so that it may be merged with the original data.

Parameters:
emailRecipient: email@recipient.com experimentId: street_cleaning_exp fileToValidate: https://path/to/file_to_validate.csv minioAccessId (sensitive value): minio_username minioAccessSecret (sensitive value): minio_password minioBucket: analisifiliera minioUrl: https://minio.coinnovationlab.it nuclioFunctionAddress: http://nome-funzione.nuclio.svc.cluster.local:8080 resourceName: Street Cleaning resourcePathUri: street_cleaning.csv resourceSchemaUri: street_cleaning_schema.json smtpHost: smtp.gmail.com smtpPassword (sensitive value): smtp_password smtpUsername: smtp_username tableName: street_cleaning

A SMTP service is needed to send an e-mail.
Assuming GMail is used, for authentication to be accepted, turn on "Less secure app access" on Google Account's Security tab: https://myaccount.google.com/u/0/security?hl=en

entry.value: Validation has revealed that file #{resourcePathUri} contains invalid data.

entry.value:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{tableName};
CREATE TABLE #{tableName} ( strada varchar, desvia varchar, percorso varchar, lato varchar, tratto varchar, note varchar, "data pulizia" varchar, "orario pulizia inizio" varchar, "orario pulizia fine" varchar, "divieto di sosta inizio" varchar, "divieto di sosta fine" varchar, "data posizionamento segnaletica" varchar, "data prima pubblicazione" varchar, "data aggiornamento" varchar );
